verses.name: Jeremiah 42:9
verses.text: And said unto them, Thus saith the Lord, the God of Israel, unto whom ye sent me to present your supplication before him;

verses.name: Jeremiah 42:10
verses.text: If ye will still abide in this land, then will I build you, and not pull you down, and I will plant you, and not pluck you up: for I repent me of the evil that I have done unto you.

verses.name: Jeremiah 42:11
verses.text: Be not afraid of the king of Babylon, of whom ye are afraid; be not afraid of him, saith the Lord: for I am with you to save you, and to deliver you from his hand.
